Island

The island module

class biosim.island.Island(island_map)[source]

Class for the island

Constructor method for class Island

Parameters:island_map (str) – A string representing the map
add_animal_island(coordinates, animals_list)[source]

Method for adding animals to the island

Parameters:
  • coordinates (tuple) – Where to put the animals on the island
  • animals_list (list) – The list of animals to put on the island
Raises:

ValueError – If coordinates is not in jungle, savannah or desert
animals_on_island()[source]

Method for getting the number of carnivores and herbivores on island

Makes one matrix for herbivores and one for carnivores, containing the number of carnivores and herbivores on the tile on the island matching the matrix.

array_to_island()[source]

Converts the array from the method string_to_array into a island.

changes the array consisting of strings into an array consisting of instances of classes depedning on the letter that was previously in the array, for example ‘J’ would turn into an instance of the Jungle-class. These are stored in Island.cells

Raises:SyntaxError – If self.map contain other letters than ‘J’, ‘S’, ‘D’, ‘O’, ‘M’.
cell_move_carnivores(coordinate)[source]

Method for moving herbivores in given cell, if they should move

Parameters:coordinate (tuple) – coordinates in which to move herbivores
cell_move_herbivores(coordinate)[source]

Method for moving herbivores in given cell, if they should move

Parameters:coordinate (tuple) – coordinates in which to move herbivores
cycle()[source]

Simulates one cycle/year

Every method is done in the order specified in the assignment

static get_direction(pi_values)[source]

Method for getting the direction for the animal to move in

Parameters:pi_values (tuple) – Values used to calculate the direction, found in the method; get_pi_values_herbivores and get_pi_values_carnivores
Returns:
Return type:Direction as a string for example ‘right’ or ‘left
get_pi_values_carnivores(coordinate)[source]

Method for calculating pi-values(propensity) for carnivores

Parameters:coordinate (tuple) – Coordinates from which to find the animals to calculate pi’s for
Returns:pi_right, pi_up, pi_left, pi_down – Different propensity-values for each direction in given cell
Return type:float
get_pi_values_herbivores(coordinate)[source]

Method for calculating pi-values(propensity) for herbivores

Parameters:coordinate (tuple) – Coordinates from which to find the animals to calculate pi’s for
Returns:pi_right, pi_up, pi_left, pi_down – Different propensity-values for each direction in given cell
Return type:float
get_random_coordinates()[source]

Method for getting random coordinates from the island

Shuffles the coordinates on the island, for use in a different method excludes the ocean at the edge of the island

Returns:points_on_island – a randomly shuffled list of coordinates from the island
Return type:list
migration()[source]

Method for handling migration

Implements the previous move-methods for herbivores and carnivores, including all new animals in that were appended in the move-methods

number_of_carnivores_island()[source]

Method for getting the total amount of herbivores on island

Returns:
Return type:Number of carnivores on island
number_of_herbivores_island()[source]

Method for getting the total amount of herbivores on island

Returns:
Return type:Number of herbivores on island
string_to_array()[source]

A method for concerting thr given string into an array

Returns:map_arr – An array of the map, where each letter has a seperate place
Return type:arr
Raises:SyntaxError – If self.map have lines of unequal length. If self.map have edges unequal to ‘O’.
